### ✅WORKING WITH DATA

```{r}
library(haven)
library(labelled)
```

```{r}
file_path<-file.path("..","data","data.sav")df<-read_sav(file_path)
```

```{r}
file_path<-file.path("..","data","data.sav") 
df<-read_sav(file_path)
head(df)
```

```{r}
codebook <- look_for(df)
```

```{r}
colnames(df)
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```

```{r}
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
freq(df)
```

### Frequency tables

### HISPANIC


### WHITE

```{r}
freq(as.ordered(df$WHITE), plot=FALSE)
```

### BLACK

```{r}
freq(as.ordered(df$BLACK) , plot=FALSE)
```
